title: Great Escape Follow Up: Bands In Transit
body:
After a very successful **Great Escape** for us here at **Crack In The Road**, the **Bands In Transit** projection filmed in Brighton was brought to my attention shortly afterwards.

While it seems an unashamed advert for the good folk at **Ford Motors**, the idea itself is rather impressive and professionally put together. Based on the premise of band’s spending months, if not years, lugging their own equipment around the nation in the back of transits, a select number of artists were invited to record a session in the back of one of the said vans. Below are two rather good sessions with **Ed Sheeran** and **James Vincent McMorrow**, however you can watch all the sessions at **[Bands In Transit](http://bandsintransit.com/index.php/)**[.](http://bandsintransit.com/index.php/)
